elements.text: You are crossing the street to the grocery store when a car pulls up. You are worried they might judge you because you are taking a while to cross the street. You realize that regardless of what the driver thinks, all that matters is that you make it across the street...

elements.name: Crossing the Street_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
